settings_sections.title: Authentication
settings_sections.description: On the authentication screen, log into your Google account with your username and password, if you are not already logged in

settings_sections.title: Select Project
settings_sections.description: After you have authenticated with your Google account, please select the project that Hull will use for your queries. Once you have selected a project, please click Save on the top right
